title: SUBCON THAILAND 2020
description: ASEAN’S MOST IMPORTANT INDUSTRIAL SUBCONTRACTING AND BUSINESS MATCHING EXHIBITION SUBCON THAILAND 2020 is the leading industrial parts and business matching event in ASEAN. This is the only event organized by the Industrial Linkage Development Division (ILDD), Thailand Board of Investment: Informa Markets: and Thai Subcontracting Promotion Association. The show presents business opportunities for automotive, electrical, electronics and related industrial parts manufacturers to meet and negotiate business with industrial part-buyers and tier 1 and tier 2 to further expand business opportunities.
